title: Matrix â€” Emergence Necessity
description: An interactive installation exploring Emergence Theory through a modular matrix system. Each module responds to external stimuli, demonstrating how simple units collectively create complex, emergent behaviors.
role: Concept Development, Mechanical Design, Coding, System Integration
challenges: Merging abstract emergence theory into a tangible interactive form.
solution: Triangular motion modules with servo and sensor-based responsiveness controlled.
outcome: Visualized emergent behaviors; showcased the aesthetic and conceptual synergy of motion and system interaction.
